sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHACKLES, aboard a ſhip, are thoſe oblong iron rings, bigger at one end than at the other, with which the ports are ſhut faſt, by thrusting the wooden bar of the port through them. There is also a fort of ſhackles to lift the hatches up with, of a like figure, but ſmaller. They are faſtened at the corners of the hatches.
